body.name: Folding Portable Mini Baby Crib with 1.5-inch Mattress - Greenguard Gold Certified, Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 6 hrs 50 mins
features: GREAT CRIB FOR SMALL SPACES OR TRAVEL: Crib includes casters for easy mobility; Folds flat for easy travel and storage; The included mattress (size: 37.5 Inches L x 23.25 Inches D x 1.5 Inches ) stores right in the crib when folded
GROWS WITH BABY: The 2 position mattress height adjustment on this crib allows you to lower the mattress as your baby begins to sit or stand
BUILT TO LAST: Strong and sturdy wood construction helps create a dream nursery where you’ll spend plenty of Mommy and Me/Daddy and Me time; Easy assembly

WE PUT YOUR BABY’S SAFETY FIRST: This crib is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM; Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards
SIZE: 39 Inches W x 25 Inches D x 37.25 Inches H;
body.description: Great for small spaces or as a travel crib, the Folding Portable Mini Baby Crib with Mattress from Delta Children is well built and versatile. Its wheels allow for easy movement throughout the home, so you can keep your baby nearby at all times. And, when you're on the go, it's easier than ever to provide a safe and comfy sleep space for your little one. Made from durable wood, it easily folds up, making it perfect for transport. Designed for convenience, the Folding Portable Mini Baby Crib with Mattress from Delta Children includes everything needed for a good night's sleep. Available in Grey, White, Dark Chocolate, Dark Cherry or Natural. New AAP guidelines say that babies should sleep in their parents’ rooms for the first year of their life, and this portable crib makes it easy to keep little ones close by. It’s the ultimate solution; a space-saver without sacrificing safety and design. Plus, it includes a mattress for additional convenience. Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality cribs affordable for all families. That’s why all Delta Children cribs are JPMA certified, and are tested above and beyond industry standards. Mattress uses 24 inches x 38 inches sheets.

A stylish and spacious dresser for all of your baby storage needs. Available in complementary finishes. Create a cozy and organized place for your baby during diaper changes with this 7-Piece Essential Changing Table Set by Delta Children. The ultimate stroller and carriage bundle allows the Revolve Stroller to effortlessly grow with your little one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: perfect crib- folds up nicely but is also great size for smaller spaces or for anyone looking for a smaller crib to get them through the crib phase in childhood. two levels for mattress to adjust. feels solid and super easy to assemble. stupid me couldn't find the instructions so googled and found a pdf online only to realize halfway in they are securely enveloped on the mattress platform. lol oops. i wasn't looking for a crib to transition them to college but one to comfortably fit my little one until the day they can tradition to a little bed in a few years. i purchased in grey and love the color. did a lot of reviewing before settling in this one but couldn't be happier. great choice!the dream on me 3" sunset firm mini crib mattress fits perfectly with no gaps and super snug fit, highly recommend this optional addition. but, crib does come with mattress though it is thin. but don't think you have to purchase another mattress if you are on a budget- just know the one it comes with is about 1" eta: don't waste your time or money on mini crib skirt though- i did and it does not fit- no room due to solid platform mattress base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, easy to assemble and perfect size!
reviews.reviewText: We love this crib! It was super easy to put together for my husband. Our little one is not ready for a full size crib yet, so we transitioned him from a bassinet to this mini crib at 4 months old while he is still in our bedroom. The crib is compact and fits right by our king size bed. The wheels make it portable and so easy to move around. We currently have it in the upper position and will lower once our son is a little older. As other reviewers mentioned, the 1" mattress pad that comes with the crib is useless for the better word, but I don't think that should take away a star from the quality of the crib. Delta recommends a 2" mini crib mattress, which are not too common. If anyone needs a recommendation, I personally purchased a 2 inch LA Baby 2 mattress, which perfectly fits this crib and is great quality for the price. Please note that we bought the grey color and out of the box it had a bit of a paint smell, but that quickly disappeared in a couple of days and is expected with painted wood, which is not a big deal. Overall this is a great quality sturdy little crib!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bed to help my daughter who has Cerebral Palsy with my grandson while his father is at work. I had turned her bedroom into a craftroom after she got married a couple years ago and wasn't wanting anything that took up a lot of space. This bed is perfect for small spaces! My daughter in law says that this is what she will buy if she has another baby. The bed folds away easily and we have even taken it to my mother's (baby's great grandmother) house to use a few times. The bed does roll very easily on hard wood floors...so you should be careful laying baby down if you don't have the bed against a wall. But I would highly recommend this bed and would re-purchase!!! It has been a life saver for assisting my daughter while she is here and can easily fold away when she isnt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Much cheaper than other mini cribs. The included mattress is very flimsy but does the job. Looks great, the sheet can be pulled over the wooden bottom if needed. I love that it rolls, we can rock the baby back and forth if they’re fussy. Can be folded up to make space, super easy to fold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good size, questionable durability.
reviews.reviewText: It was pretty easy to assemble, easy instructions for folding to store. But instead of putting the caster wheels on I had to go buy adhesive felt furniture tabs to put on the bottom. The hole wasn’t drilled the hardware to pop the caster wheel in wasn’t there. I considered drilling a hole myself, but wild have had to gorilla glue the peg on the wheel to keep it installed. And without the wheels the legs scratched the floor.The mattress is also very thin, so will be replacing it. But it’s as described in the description of the crib and mattress, so it wasn’t a surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I have the smaller of my two bedrooms with a king bed in it and this crib is the perfect fit! It’s sturdy, cute, can be folded up easily for storage, and is just all around perfect for tiny living. Highly recommend. Won’t use any other even if I get more space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In love with this crib
reviews.reviewText: Had to wait a few months for the grey crib to go into stock again and it was worth the wait. You definitely need two people to assemble so you can easily hold everything into place. It didn’t come with a screwdriver like some reviews said, just on for the two nut bolts for the baseboard. My husband and I used a butter knife for the rest of the screws lol. The instructions are hard to understand, but found this easy step by step instructional video on YouTube that got us through the whole process in about 20 minutes. Didn’t find any scratches or chips. It slipped easily through my door and on the side of the bed. Still enough space to fit our diaper pailAlso we bought the dream on me 3” mattress because the mattress that came was thin like the reviews say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color , storage , and price , Awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a small crib for my house for the grand babies. I really like the color ( gender neutral) durability and the easy storage . My husband put it together and I was not there so I do not know anything about the assembly . I bought a mattress to use in it because of the other reviews and I am happy I did. The “mattress” that comes with it is so thin, I realize so you can store everything together but seriously folks buy a different one and just store beside the bed. Overall though I would definitely recommend and would buy again. Great product and price!
